data.title: “[Edward Snowden] has revealed evidence of what appears to be crimes against the Constitution of the United States,” – Former Vice President Al Gore.
Exclusive: Swiss study says Polonium found in Arafat's bones. Scientists find at least 18 times the normal levels of radioactive element in late Palestinian leader's remains
The Indian Mars Mission cost $73 million which is less than the production budget for the movie Gravity ($105 million)
Irish Prime Minister comes out in support of Gay Marriage, and promises to hold a referendum on the issue by 2015. The Catholic Church has condemned his remarks.

The giant Spanish wine corporation Codorníu, has permits in place right now to clear-cut 154 acres of coveted California coastal redwood forest and grade the soils to construct a sprawling vineyard, roads, and reservoirs in their place
'Silk Road' illicit online market reopens just four weeks after US seizure
Yasser Arafat may have been poisoned with polonium, tests show: Swiss scientists find levels of polonium 18 times higher than normal in first forensic tests on former Palestinian leader's body
